text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify a key uncertainty in cross-border coordination as being the enforceability of US discovery orders in the EU. The candidate answer discusses the conflict between US (California) expansive discovery and German limited discovery (ZPO ยง142) and the risk of documents subject to German privilege (Anwaltsprivileg) being disclosed in the UK.
